alston.minecraft

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • alston.minecraft.Window
      • alston.minecraft.Inventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Inventory
extends Window
    Contains all the Items the player currently has in their inventory, and is the handles all interactions between the UI and the inventory, including (but not limited to) handing the visual functions, changing the Items in it, ect.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Inventory(InventoryBar bar)
      Constructs a new Inventory by initializaing the array of Items (however, NOT each individual Item; setup() should be called to do this for efficiency and readibility purposes), and all the Nodes associated with the Inventory.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      int getCurrentItem() 
      SlotArea getInventorySpace() 
      void restore()
      Restores the inventory bar and menu to the inventoryNode.
      void setCurrentItem(int currentItem)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Inventory

        public Inventory(InventoryBar bar)
        Constructs a new Inventory by initializaing the array of Items (however, NOT each individual Item; setup() should be called to do this for efficiency and readibility purposes), and all the Nodes associated with the Inventory.
        Parameters:
        bar - The InventoryBar for Items to be attached to

    • Method Detail

      • restore

        public void restore()
        Restores the inventory bar and menu to the inventoryNode.

      • getCurrentItem

        public int getCurrentItem()
        Returns:
        The index of the inventory of what the player has currently selected

      • getInventorySpace

        public SlotArea getInventorySpace()
        Returns:
        The SlotArea of only the inventory space

      • getCraftingSpace

        public SlotArea getCraftingSpace()
        Returns:
        The SlotArea of the crating area in the inventory

      • setCurrentItem

        public void setCurrentItem(int currentItem)
        Parameters:
        currentItem - The new currently selected index of the inventory the player has selected
